project.name: yosonjs
project.description: A lightweight sandbox library in JavaScript for manage modular scripts

DependencyManager.name: DependencyManager
DependencyManager.description: Class manager of one or many requests

Dependency.name: Dependency
Dependency.description: Class dealer of an url and indicates if ready or not

classitems.description: Setting the host of the static elements
classitems.name: setStaticHost

params.name: hostName
params.description:
the host of the static elements,
like a CDN url

return.description: Get the host saved with the method setStaticHost

classitems.description: Setting the suffix for the url, ideally when working with elements versioned
classitems.name: setVersionUrl

params.name: versionNumber
params.description: the suffix or number for concatenate in the url

return.description: Get the suffix saved with the method setVersionUrl

classitems.description: method what transform the url to request
classitems.name: transformUrl

params.name: url
params.description: the url self to transform and ready for request

classitems.description: method what use the url and generateid the id for the manager
classitems.name: generateId

params.name: url
params.description: the url self to generate your id

classitems.description: method what receive an url to the manager
classitems.name: addScript

params.name: url
params.description: the url self to request in the manager

classitems.description: method what receive an list of urls to request and callbacks when the requests are ready
classitems.name: ready

params.name: onReady
params.description: Callback to execute when the all requests are ready

classitems.description: method what verify the avaliability of an Dependency
classitems.name: avaliable

params.name: url
params.description: the url to query if its avaliable or not

params.name: onAvaliable
params.description: Callback to execute when the url its avaliable

return.description: if the dependency its avaliable return true

classitems.description: return the dependency saved in the manager
classitems.name: getDependency

params.name: url
params.description: the url to get in the manager

return.description: the object Dependency created by the url

classitems.description: Query if its appened in the collection of the manager
classitems.name: alreadyInCollection

params.name: id
params.description: the id generated by the url

return.description: the object Dependency created by the url

classitems.description: Query if its loaded the dependency in the manager
classitems.name: alreadyLoaded

params.name: id
params.description: the id generated by the url

return.description: the object Dependency created by the url

classitems.description: Return the status of the request
classitems.name: getStatus

classitems.description: Call the request of the script
classitems.name: request

classitems.description: Trigger when the request its started
classitems.name: onRequest

classitems.description: Trigger when the request its successfully
classitems.name: onReadyRequest

classitems.description: Trigger when the request have an error in the load of the script
classitems.name: onErrorRequest

classitems.description: Call the request of the script for IE browser
classitems.name: requestIE

params.name: src
params.description: the newScript created in the method request
